Class RadioButtonNodeRenderer

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Renders a radio button group node using the white headered base. Value persisted in Node.Data as RadioButtonData.

public class RadioButtonNodeRenderer : WhiteHeaderedNodeRendererBase, IEditableNodeRenderer, IDataNodeRenderer, INodeRenderer
